title: Celestial Blossom Kada - Diamond Floral Bracelet
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Crafted with Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: Delicately crafted Kada style bracelet featuring alternating floral motifs. Each flower is meticulously encrusted with sparkling CZ stones in a pave setting, creating a brilliant display of light. The simple, elegant design ensures comfort and versatility.
colors: Radiant gold and dazzling clear white (CZ) stones.
occasions: or Diwali. Can also be a thoughtful gift for birthdays or anniversaries.
description: This Celestial Blossom Kada seamlessly blends modern design with traditional Indian aesthetics. The shimmering CZ stones emulate the brilliance of diamonds at an accessible price point. Lightweight and comfortable, this Kada is a stylish way to add a touch of sparkle to any outfit. Durable Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and beauty.
